item.title: About Me
item.description: With 17 years of dynamic experience as a Software Architect, I specialize in delivering cutting-edge solutions that empower enterprises to modernize through digital transformation. Iâ€™ve successfully led software projects across industries such as public sector, banking, automotive, and retail, working with clients in the EU, UK, and USA. My approach focuses on understanding customer pain points, including legacy system bottlenecks, inefficiencies in cloud adoption, and challenges in AI integration.
